sentences.translation: I have never been to a desert.

sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管沙漠看起来充满死亡与绝望，但是它也孕育着生命和希望。
sentences.traditionalText: 儘管沙漠看起來充滿死亡與絕望，但是它也孕育著生命和希望。
sentences.pinyin: Jǐnguǎn shāmò kàn qǐlái chōngmǎn sǐwáng yǔ juéwàng, dànshì tā yě yùnyù zhe shēngmìng hé xīwàng.
sentences.translation: Even though the desert seems full of death and despair, it also nurtures life and hope.
